nodes.text: Prefab shelters were structures constructed with carbon used by many civilizations to support their people, and were constructed by droid or organic workers such as Glurrgs. Although the Trade Federation was more than capable of building and using prefab centers, they did not use prefab shelters a large percentage of the time because of their extensive use of droids. The Gungans, Naboo's indigenous sentient species, built prefab shelters underwater. The Grand Army of the Republic's prefab shelters allowed for a significant increase in its numbers compared to the prefab shelters of other factions.

Prefab shelters appear in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds and its 2003 expansion pack. The Trade Federation, unlike the other civilizations, was not required to build the structures to support their army, but Federation shelters did appear in the game.
